overview: On a rustic, rural, Midwestern farm, Corbin Fisher's most popular studs get in to loads of hot, wild fun and prove there's nothing more American than baseball, apple pie, and ripped, hung men! Outdoors, in fields and barns, and wherever else they can sneak away to for some hardcore play. Dru, Trey, Connor, Dawson, Elijah, and Travis heat things up in 126 minutes of action shot entirely on location in the American heartland.
tagline: It can get dirty down at the farm.
title: Down On The Farm
